flawed_nl_solution:
Peter is 10 years old because he has 10 birthday candles on his cake.
Rupert is 3.5 times older than Peter so Rupert will have 3.5*10 = <<3.5*10=53>>53 candles on his cake.
#### 53

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 35, not 53. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
